SiteFrame.Name: NPTG localities used by Metrobike 1
SiteFrame.Description: This frame contains the NPTG locality definitions used by the stops the service. It could also be exchanged separately.

ServiceFrame.Name: Stops for Metrobike 1
ServiceFrame.Description: This frame contains the stop and line definitions for the service. It could also be exchanged separately.

UserProfile.Name: Child
UserProfile.Description: 5-13 year olds are normally charged half adult fare on singles and returns. Discounts are available on Metrorider and Metrovoyager ticktes. 14 & 15 year olds may travel at child rate on any Metrobike service, if one of the advertised proofs of age is supplied.

UserProfile.Name: Infant
UserProfile.Description: Up to three children under 5 years of age, accompanied by a fare paying adult or child passenger, and not occupying a seat, may travel free of charge on the Company’s services.

Notice.Text: Fares are shown in pence. Eg. 170 = £1.70
To calculate your fare, find your location, and your destination, where the row and the column cross is your fare.
